sections.subtitle: Motivation and Goals
paragraphs: In my experience as a software engineer, the desire to build a space that truly encapsulates my professional journey, achievements and the spectrum of projects I've passionately worked on led me to design and launch this very site.
It was to be a showcase of some of my more recent and favorite work, offering a window for peers, potential collaborators and the curious to explore the work that fuels my joy for this field.

sections.subtitle: How It Works
paragraphs: My personal site is built on React and Next.js, with Tailwind CSS for styling and Framer Motion for fluid animations. Leveraging Vercel's experimental Turbopack for rapid development and optimal build times, the site also integrates Courier for efficient message notification services.
Hosting on Vercel provides my site with optimal loading times, automatic scaling and out-of-the-box continuous deployment, ensuring performance and reliability.

sections.subtitle: Technology Stack
paragraphs: I chose this stack to leverage a modern, highly performant and developer-friendly ecosystem that ensures ultra fast development, easy maintenance and seamless deployment.

sections.subtitle: Final Thoughts
paragraphs: Each tool played a pivotal role in bringing my vision to life, enabling me to design a responsive site that stands as a dynamic portfolio of my work and a bridge to connect with visitors from around the world.

I’m so grateful that you’ve taken the time to learn more about me and my work. I welcome you to reach out if you're interested in discussing a web development project/service I can offer. Thanks for stopping by!
